QuestData.Title: Gifts of the Great Crane
QuestData.Description: The cranes of Krasarang are a gift from Chi-Ji. Even the very feathers they leave behind are a gift for us to appreciate.$b$bWe use these feathers to adorn our garments and to fletch arrows. But first... they must be gathered.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 10 Gifts of the Great Crane.
